I assume this is WTP, correct?

Yes, it is Web Tools Platform. Can you suggest how to solve the publish problem? Thanks!

hi Deki, thanks for the info; that helps me identify the WLS version but I'll need a bit more info about the version of Eclipse/WTP, the type of project you were trying to publish and the error you encountered (you should find the any relevant publish error info in the Eclipse .log file in metadata folder in your workspace)

thanks, Rob

Gorkem: sending your way; looks like it's due to an NPE in GenericServerBehavior (I wasn't able to find a dup but I suspect this is one that's already been seen and fixed).

Deki: what type of module were you trying to publish?

Can not repro with the 1.0 RC1. I looked back to 0.7 and it looks like trouble reading the serverdef. We had a few problems with not being able to read serverdef files earlier and they are fixed. Could you please try a later version?

Hi Rob,

I use Eclipse SDK version 3.1.0 and publish to weblogic 8.1.

Thanks!

Deki

This bug was moved to 'closed' state, since it is so old is is assumed its dup, invalid, or worksforme resolution is no longer in qustion and the bugzilla needs no further attention. Feel free to re-open, or open a new bug, if this semi-automatic processing was done in error in this case.
